Iceland AI for Educators

World's first national-scale AI deployment in education. Featured on Anthropic's website.

Reference: Director of Innovation, Ministry of Education

Case Study Details

Context, deliverables, governance, roadmap

Context

Ministry sought AI tools for teachers while maintaining data sovereignty and GDPR compliance.

Delivered

Multi-vendor pilot (Anthropic + Google), training curriculum, evaluation framework, governance structure.

Governance

GDPR compliance, no student data exposure, ministry oversight committee, escalation pathways.

Roadmap

Phase 2: All Icelandic schools. Nordic replication discussions. 40+ country pipeline.

View official page →
